1:
Judge me, Yahweh, for I have walked with integrity;\q I have trusted in Yahweh without wavering.
\q
2:
Examine me, Yahweh, and test me;\q test the purity of my inner parts and my heart!
\q
3:
For your covenant faithfulness is before my eyes,\q and I walk about in your faithfulness.


\q
4:
I do not associate with deceitful people,\q nor do I mingle with dishonest people.
\q
5:
I hate the assembly of evildoers,\q and I do not live with the wicked.


\q
6:
I wash my hands in innocence,\q and I go around your altar, Yahweh,
\q
7:
to sing a loud song of praise\q and report all your wonderful deeds.
\q
8:
Yahweh, I love the house where you live,\q the place where your glory lives!


\q
9:
Do not sweep me away with sinners,\q or my life with people who are bloodthirsty,
\q
10:
in whose hands there is a plot,\q and whose right hand is full of bribes.


\q
11:
But as for me, I will walk in integrity;\q redeem me and have mercy on me.
\q
12: My foot stands on level ground;\q in the assemblies will I bless Yahweh!
